dev_mode.label: Developer Mode
dev_mode.comment: If Yes, we will connect to your MageRewards staging account for testing and development.

canUseRedemptionsIfNotLoggedIn.label: Customer Can Spend Points Before Logging In
canUseRedemptionsIfNotLoggedIn.comment: If enabled, customers will be able to spend points before they log-in. Recommended off.

doIgnoreCDWhenCR.label: Allow earning of catalog points while spending points in the catalog.
doIgnoreCDWhenCR.comment: If not allowed, customers will not earn catalog level points when they spend points on the catalog item.

doIgnoreCDWhenSCR.label: Allow earning of catalog points while spending points in the shopping cart
doIgnoreCDWhenSCR.comment: If not allowed, the customer will not earn any catalog points if they spend points in the shopping cart.

shopping_cart_rule_earn_after_discount.label: Give Shopping Cart Distribution Points Based on Subtotal
shopping_cart_rule_earn_after_discount.comment: If set to after discounts, customers will only earn points in the shopping cart based on the subtotal after spending any points or getting any discounts.

freeshipping_when_spending_points.label: Free shipping when spending points
freeshipping_when_spending_points.comment: If enabled, MageRewards will give free shipping to customers when they are spending points.

allow_catalog_rules_admin_order_create.label: Allow catalog rules inside Admin Order Creation
allow_catalog_rules_admin_order_create.comment: If not allowed, catalog earning and spending rules will not have any effect inside admin order create process.

apply_rules_to_parent.label: Apply rules to parent products
apply_rules_to_parent.comment: If Yes, we will apply shopping cart rules to parent bundle products as well.

showCartRedemptionsWhenZero.label: Always Show Cart Redemptions Row
showCartRedemptionsWhenZero.comment: If set to show, this will always display the points spent row in the cart even when no points are being spent.

showCartDistributionsWhenZero.label: Always Show Cart Earnings Row
showCartDistributionsWhenZero.comment: If set to show, this will always display the points earned row in the cart even when no points are being earned.

showSidebar.label: Show Points Sidebar
showSidebar.comment: If set to show, this will display a small sidebar in some CMS pages that displays how many points a customer has.

showSidebarIfNotLoggedIn.label: Show Sidebar When Not Logged In
showSidebarIfNotLoggedIn.comment: If set to show, this will display a small sidebar in some CMS pages that displays how many points a customer has, even if the customer isn't logged in.

noPointsCaption.label: No Points Caption
noPointsCaption.comment: What text to display to a customer when they don't have any points.

showWarningTextMessage.label: Show Warning Text Message
showWarningTextMessage.comment: Show a warning mesage in the cart and order review page for Guests or Not Logged In customers if they try to earn or spend points.

rewardsCatalogNumProducts.label: # Products In Mini Rewards Catalog
rewardsCatalogNumProducts.comment: The number of products to show in the mini rewards catalog in a customer's "My Points & Rewards" section.

customer_summary_msg.label: Customer Account Summary Message
customer_summary_msg.comment: This message is displayed in the summary box for logged in customers. Default is no message (blank). HTML is valid here.

showSendPointsToAFriend.label: Allow Customers to Send Points To A Friend
showSendPointsToAFriend.comment: Should the customer be given the option to send points to a friend? Strongly recommended to be hidden.

friend_notification_email_template.label: Friend Transfer Notification Email Template
friend_notification_email_template.comment: When a customer sends points to a friend, the customer receiving the points will get this notification email.

sendInvitationEmailToUnregisteredFriend.label: Send Invitation To Store Email
sendInvitationEmailToUnregisteredFriend.comment: If enabled and a customer tries to send points to a friend which doesn't have an account, an email invitation to the store will be sent.

friend_invitation_email_template.label: Friend Invitation To Store Email Template
friend_invitation_email_template.comment: When a customer sends points to a friend, the customer receiving the points will get an invitation email to the store if not registered yet ( no points ).

showMiniRedeemCatalog.label: Show Mini Rewards Catalog
showMiniRedeemCatalog.comment: Display the mini rewards catalog in a customer's My Points & Rewards section? Catalog spending rules must be set up for this to show products.

showPointsOptimizer.label: Show "as low as $X with Y points" in the catalog
showPointsOptimizer.comment: If enabled this will show text in the catalog that shows a customer what price they can get the product for with their points. This will only show if you have catalog spending rules present that apply to the particular product.

showEarningGraphic.label: Show the Earning Graphic in the Catalog

showPointsSectionInCustomerAccount.label: Show Points and Rewards Section in Customer Account

show_cart_discount_full_summary.label: Show Rewards Cart Discounts Full Summary
show_cart_discount_full_summary.comment: If enabled the cart discount total will display an expandable full summary of the rewards cart discounts.

allow_points_summary_email.label: Send Points Summary Email
allow_points_summary_email.comment: If enabled, a monthly points summary email will be sent to customers. Customers can set their preference whether to receive the email in the their My Points & Rewards section.

send_email_with_no_points.label: Send Email To Users With No Points

customer_group.label: Send Email To The Following Customer Groups

product_view_page_review_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

form_review_points.label: Points Earned for Writing a Review in the Review Listing Pages
form_review_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

product_view_page_tag_points.label: Points Earned for Tagging a Product in the Product Info Pages
product_view_page_tag_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

shopping_cart_item_points.label: Points Earned/Spent Listing on Each Item Row in Shopping Cart
shopping_cart_item_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

shopping_cart_under_coupon.label: Shopping Cart Spending Rules Interface in Shopping Cart
shopping_cart_under_coupon.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

customer_dashboard_summary.label: Points Account Summary in the Customer Dashboard
customer_dashboard_summary.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions.

customer_orders_points_total_column.label: Points Total Column in Customer Recent Orders & My Orders

predict_birthday_points.label: Predict Points Earned on Birthday Occasion
predict_birthday_points.comment: Click here for manual integration instructions

InitialTransferStatus.label: Initial Transfer Statuses
InitialTransferStatus.comment: Note: You can set points to be automatically approved in the Order Fulfillment settings below.

shouldRemovePointsOnCancelledOrder.label: Automatically Remove Points on Failed Checkouts and Mass Order Cancellations
shouldRemovePointsOnCancelledOrder.comment:
Automatically revoke/cancel point transfers associated with an order when it's cancelled because of a failed payment during the checkout process, or when the admin makes a mass admin order cancellation.
Click here for more information on this.

shouldApprovePointsOnInvoice.label: Automatically Approve Points on Invoice
shouldApprovePointsOnInvoice.comment: Automatically approve all related point earnings and spendings when the customer pays for the order.

shouldApprovePointsOnShipment.label: Automatically Approve Points on Shipment
shouldApprovePointsOnShipment.comment: Automatically approve all related point earnings and spendings when the order has been shipped.

shouldApprovePointsOn.label: Automatically Approve Points on
shouldApprovePointsOn.comment: Automatically approve all related point earnings and spendings when the order has been updated to the selected stage.

transferComments.label: Transfer Comments
transferComments.comment:
Note: These comments are what appears in the points transfer earning/spending history for customers and what appears in the points transfer history and management screens for the administrator.
Note: The order of each "%s" wildcard string matters.

reviewOrRatingEarned.label: Points Earned for Writing a Review or Rating a Product

pollEarned.label: Points Earned for Participating in a Poll

tellAFriendEarned.label: Points Earned for Telling a Friend About a Product

tagEarned.label: Points Earned for Tagging a Product

newsletterEarned.label: Points Earned for Signing Up to the Newsletter

signupEarned.label: Points Earned for Signing Up to the Site

sendToFriend.label: Points Sent to a Friend
sendToFriend.comment: First %s: Reciever name. Second %s: Sender comments.

receiveFromFriend.label: Points Received from a Friend
receiveFromFriend.comment: First %s: Sender name. Second %s: Sender comments.

expired.label: Expired Points Balance Transfer
expired.comment: First %s: Number of days since expired.

showUsageNotification.label: Account Usage Notifications
showUsageNotification.comment: If enabled, MageRewards will notify you on your Magento dashboard as you approach your usage limit.

reviews_and_tags.label: Product Review and Product Tag Rewards Settings

daily_review_limit.label: Daily Limit for Product Reviews
daily_review_limit.comment: Maximum number of product reviews to reward for per day. Use 0 for unlimited.

weekly_review_limit.label: Weekly Limit for Product Reviews
weekly_review_limit.comment: Maximum number of product reviews to reward for per week. Use 0 for unlimited.

daily_tag_limit.label: Daily Limit for Product Tags
daily_tag_limit.comment: Maximum number of product tags to reward for per day. Use 0 for unlimited.

weekly_tag_limit.label: Weekly Limit for Product Tags
weekly_tag_limit.comment: Maximum number of product tags to reward for per week. Use 0 for unlimited.

migration.label: Migration Utilities
migration.comment: Please Note: You should only run these functions if you really know what you're doing or you are advised by a MageRewards representative.

export_campaign.label: Export Campaign
export_campaign.comment: This will export point currencies, rules and MageRewards configuration.

import_campaign.label: Import Campaign
import_campaign.comment:
WARNING: THIS WILL ALSO DELETE ALL YOUR CURRENT MAGEREWARDS RULES!
Select a .stcampaign file and click 'Save Config' to import.

export_settings.label: Export MageRewards Settings
export_settings.comment: This will export your current MageRewards settings.

import_settings.label: Import MageRewards Settings
import_settings.comment:
WARNING: THIS WILL ALSO DELETE ALL YOUR CURRENT MAGEREWARDS SETTINGS!
Select a .stsettings file and click 'Save Config' to import.

help.label: Diagnostics & Support Tools
help.comment: Please Note: You should only run these functions if you really know what you're doing or you are advised by a MageRewards representative.

reinstalldb.label: Re-run Database Scripts
reinstalldb.comment: When clicked, this will attempt to remove Magento's memory of the MageRewards database components ever being installed. Magento will then attempt to re-install the database from scratch upon next access. This may help resolve issues with an abnormal installation or inconsistent database migration.

rundiagnostics.label: Run 'Test Sweet' Diagnostics
rundiagnostics.comment: When clicked, this will run a diagnostics utility that will tell you information about your store and check for any common problems that may occur on your store. When contacting our software support team, you should have this report handy.

showDashboardStPanel.label: Display MageRewards Panel In The Dashboard
showDashboardStPanel.comment: If No, MageRewards will hide it's display block from the Magento administrative dashboard

debug_mode.label: Debug Logging Mode
debug_mode.comment: If Enabled, we will log a lot of data, such as all API calls sent up to platform.

associate_guest_checkouts_with_account.label: Create Customer Accounts for Guest Checkouts
associate_guest_checkouts_with_account.comment: This will allow customers who checkout as guests to earn points. This will send welcome emails to purchasers who didn't have an account already.

enable_paypal_checkout_fee.label: PayPal Standard Tax-Only Checkout Fee
enable_paypal_checkout_fee.comment: If this option is enabled, a 0.01 amount (in the base currency of the store) is added to the checkout total to allow the PayPal Standard checkout to proceed when the user is discounting the product completely and only paying for the remaining tax amount. This function is needed because PayPal Standard (Website Payments Standard) does not allow checkouts to occur if the customer is only paying for the tax amount.

adjust_points_cancelation.label: Adjust Points when Canceling Orders
adjust_points_cancelation.comment: When set to no, the points will be automatically adjusted.

no_rules_message.label: No Rules Message
no_rules_message.comment: This message will be displayed if there are no applicable rules on the cart page.

is_enabled.label: Points Expiry
is_enabled.comment: Enable or disable point expiration. If enabled, all of a customer's points will expire if they do not earn or spend points within X days.

delay_days.label: Number of Days Before Points Balance Expires
delay_days.comment: The number of days that must pass where a customer does not earn or spend any points for their points to expire.

email_warning1_template.label: Email Template for First Warning Email

email_warning1_days.label: Number of Days Before Points Expiry to Send First Warning Email
email_warning1_days.comment:
<script type="text/javascript">
                                        (function() {
                                            var warning1email = $('rewards_expire_email_warning1_template');
                                            var warning1days = $('rewards_expire_email_warning1_days');
                                            var warning1daysRow = $('row_rewards_expire_email_warning1_days');

                                            if (warning1days.getValue() < 0) { 
                                                warning1email.setValue('none'); 
                                            }

                                            if (warning1email.getValue() === 'none') { 
                                                warning1daysRow.hide(); 
                                            }
                                            
                                            Event.observe(warning1email, 'change', function() {
                                                (warning1email.getValue() === 'none') ? warning1daysRow.hide() : warning1daysRow.show(); 
                                            });
                                        })();
                                    </script>

email_warning2_days.label: Number of Days Before Points Expiry to Send Second Warning Email
email_warning2_days.comment:

                                                (warning2email.getValue() === 'none') ? warning2daysRow.hide() : warning2daysRow.show(); 
                                            });
                                        })();
                                    </script>

log_when_points_expire.label: Write Expiry Actions to Log
log_when_points_expire.comment: Writes to var/log/rewards_expire.log when points expire for any customer or when an e-mail is sent

modules_disable_output.comment: Note: Disabling output will not turn off module functionality and it will only turn off the _DISPLAY_ of the module(s).
